front.title: IEEEE Draft Standard for Definite-Purpose Switching Devices for Use in Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear--Amendment 1

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: low voltage ac power circuit breaker
front.abstract: This amendment to the standard revises the short-circuit rating and test requirements for definite purpose switching devices for use in metal-enclosed low-voltage power circuit breaker switchgear.
